column3: “Awesome CBD strain that gives a tingle in the girly bits!”
“Great for both pain and amazing sex, ha!”
“Beautiful lighter green with lots if crystals. Pungent aroma. Smooth and flavorful, giving a very pleasant heady buzz. Plus it really kills a lot of my arthritic pain.”

“Have been smoking for the past thirty years. WhitebSiberian is one of those strains you know is awesome by just looking at the prime quality buds. After years of smoking, you become an expert by just looking at the bud. The smell test is next, you must smell the flower upclose, first in its natural form, then grinded. Then comes the taste and after-taste tests. And finally, the effects test to see how high you get an...”
“Very sensual...a lovely lady who soothes and calms the body...feel all your cares melt away...ahh...”
“Very Enjoyable! Great for Nausea!”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer 

Pros: Pain relief that kicks in fairly quickly. Relaxing body calm feeling, same feeling in the mind/head.

Cons: No real major cons imo, however taste is interesting as it had a hint of spice on draw and exhale, yet earthy and what I thought was a light pine taste, however the description of flowery taste is more apt.

Overall: Good for pain and relaxation without sleepines...”
“I absolutely LOVE this strain! I've had my card for about two months and have smoked many strains (smoker for 8 years) and this is by far my favorite for a couch potato/relaxed high.”

“Method of consumption: Volcano Vaporizer 

Pros: Pain relief that kicks in fairly quickly. Relaxing body calm feeling, same feeling in the mind/head.

Cons: No real major cons imo, however taste is interesting as it had a hint of spice on draw and exhale, yet earthy and what I thought was a light pine taste, however the description of flowery taste is more apt.

Overall: Good for pain and relaxation without sleepines...”

“worked well for pain relief and i was able to work on line with ease. very tasty, very pretty flower, beautiful  dark green with a ton of little reddish/orange hairs all over this flower. when bed time rolled around i was able to relax and sleep very well. this bud was satin soft and fluffy.”

“This is one of my new favorites!!  Mixed it with the shake from Mohave Green Dispensary, which is Platinum Wreck, and it made the best medicine ever!!!  Made cannabis infused coconut oil with it......outstanding!!!  5 Stars!!!”
“I like this strain alot. great smell, nice crystals and tight buds. this hybrid is very nice”
“Uppity buzz, not too wild.  Good smell and taste”
“loved”
“Nice earthy scent with a very clear high”
“Super relaxed high. Enjoyed smokin this shit a lot haha 😈!”
“la euforia que genera esta planta es única, de las mejores que he probado....”
“This one has a flavory taste! I like it and I prefer to smoke it out of a pre roll”
“Well lets put it this way.. pending on how much you buy will tell you the effects. All are very small CLOSET LIKE' grown

column1: flowers.. If your lucky like me after buying an OZ . I got some
Branch sorts.. They look like brains!! And when you get them webs over it only on certain flowers its pure INDICA happiness..
The taste has a whisp of CARMEX in it .. pure white ash.Effects on the good buds are wonderful long lasting...”"

column3: “I found this energizing, strong,  and I feel playful and drawn into whatever I am doing...so maybe focused. I also found this to be arousing and perfect for sex. IF I am physically tired...after say 2-3 sessions with this I become sleepy. However when I am not physically tired in the first place...that tiredness can take much longer to show up.  And the tiredness" thing tends to show up after a while for me with mul...”"
“A spot on!" strain
column6: very relaxing and a fun high for getting out and productive
column7: or even spark some creativity. Thanks Earth's Healing!”"

column3: “great strain. keeps you call and mellow while at the same time being able to do things and still able to focus.”

“This is my go-to for daytime smoking. This allows me to be functional while feeling relaxed. 
Also smoked this at a concert and it hightened the experience. Although I have smoked this at bedtime on accident (forgot it was a hybrid)  and I was wired awake for few more hours than I wanted.”
“Super mellow for the client who wants the effects without feeling stoned.”
“Great strain for me.   I find that once I am up and moving, it keeps me energetic and focused.   Awesome couch lock if you prefer that side.”

“I asked my budtender to recommend a daytime-use strain for a mixed group of people. If I'm sharing with coworkers on a mid-day break, it is best to bring a strain with energetic and uplifting effects, but the work is also hard on the body, so I wanted to find a strain that would lower inflammation. 
White Siberian has a pleasantly woody flavor. Soon after smoking, my angsty afternoon crank was feeling uplifted and I ...”
“Delicious, great for getting magic happening in the bedroom.”
“Decent high and it hit very slowly but then all at once. Long lasting! Tastes better than average”
“First strain I ever smoked. nice steady high, perfect for first timers. Smells beautiful, and tastes good. Again, definitely good for first timers”
“havnt medicated on it yet, though no doubt it's unique!! this cut smells like a semi-sweet loaf of bread, and nothing else! very strange but I can't wait to try it!”
“Uplifting, happy, a bit of a cloudy high which mellows you out. One of my favorite strains thus far! I'm usually a fan of sativa, but this hybrid is an excellent alternative!”
“too harsh of a strain.”
